statements: DELETE FROM lab_test_results WHERE patient_id = 100 AND test_date = '2022-01-05';
DELETE FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_id = 101 AND patient_id = 201;
DELETE FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_date < '2022-01-01' AND test_result >= 50.0;
DELETE FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date < '2021-01-01' AND test_result = 'Positive';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result = 'Negative');
DELETE FROM test_orders WHERE patient_id = 10 AND test_id = 3;
